 import { TransferenciaService } from './../services/transferencia.service'; import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-extrato', templateUrl: './extrato.component.html', styleUrls: ['./extrato.component.scss'] }) export class ExtratoComponent { transferencias: any[]; constructor (private service: TransferenciaService){} ngOnInit() { this.transferencias = this.service.transferencias; } }
